body:
Comment 2: 
I cannot reproduce this.  
The two lines should compile identically, and judging
from the assembly you posted, they do.  I tweaked the
assembly enough to make it assemble with 5a and the
resulting binary runs correctly.  I also compiled the
program with 5g and the resulting binary runs correctly.

I have attached the sources I am using and the binaries
that I got.  Please try the attached binaries
(5.s.out, 5.go.out) and see what they print.
Maybe there is something different between your 
execution environment (real hw) and mine (qemu, at
the moment).
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._ Attachments: 1. x.tar.gz (107611 bytes)
